NA. 03: 一家咨询公司 (USA/美国)

Profile

This is a professional international business development consultancy with a deep specialism in East Asia. We enable Western companies to expand in Asia, and Asian companies in the West. It also works with US economic development agencies to promote exports and attract foreign direct investment into the US. We currently represent the states of South Carolina, Missouri and Colorado.

简介

该公司是国际一流的商业发展咨询公司，尤其专注于东亚业务。我们帮助西方公司在亚洲的扩张。本公司还与美国经济发展机构合作，促进对美出口，以及外国企业在美国直接投资。此公司目前与南卡罗来纳州，密苏里州和科罗拉多州均有合作。

Business Interest

Meeting domestic the automotive, advanced materials or aerospace manufacturer and are interested in companies considering to open a factory or office in the US.

合作需求

寻求有在美国有办厂、设立分公司需求的汽车、先进材料、航空等制造行业的国内企业，为在南卡州投资的中国企业提供免费服务。

Want to know more？

Register

Other Matchmaking Companies

2018年5月1日

ABOUT US

Launched by the Global Alliance of SMEs (GASME), World Manufacturing Convention 2018 is co-hosted by Global Alliance of SMEs, United Nations Industrial Development Organization, Anhui Provincial Government, Chinese People’s Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries. This convention will kick off in Hefei in May 2018.

RECENT NEWS

  • Anhui Provincial Party Secretary Li Jinbin met with Former German President Christian Wulff 2017年6月19日
  • Ningbo Thunderstruck Holdings Co., Ltd as the Organizer of World Manufacturing Convention 2018 2017年6月15日
  • Vice Premier Ma Kai Met with Former German President Christian Wulff 2017年6月13日

CONTACT US
